title: Bugged Runes
body:
Hello, i have a same problem like this user https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/v2KAiEUE-bugged-runes
basically, i cant change my 2nd rune page, i tried restarting the client and editing the runepage, but it didnt work, i d appreciate if this bug could be fixed, thanks.

replies.body: We're investigating this issue, and we'd like to help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your issue and track what's going on.  To help speed things up, rename your impacted rune pages and be sure to let your specialist know what you've named them to.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

#Can you please help me

All my runes are FUBAR now on the new client. Practically every slot now is bugged/linked to another.

I spent HOURS last night trying to fix the issue and it just got worse.

I've sent a support ticket almost 2 days ago but they're not helping me at all -- and the support site portal is broken now (won't open the page).

I just want my rune pages unlinked; I've spent countless hours setting up 20 pages to exact specifications for my champs, and I hate using the old client (everything works there, just not w/ the new client now).

Yes, I'm here friend!  I see your post here and other thread, and putting in a ticket was a solid plan.  What's your ticket number?  I'm happy to check on the status for you.  You should still get email notifications when we've responded to your ticket, which you can use to reply back to.  Let me know!
Your response from today was received!  The specialist will need to take a few moments to investigate and get this fixed up for you.  I know you're eager to get this fixed, but hang tight!
